name: BREATHE
description: Descend beneath the waves and explore treasure-filled waters! Scour a mysterious island for secret treasure, and unearth long-hidden secrets.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core2Quad 2.67 GHz or AMD Phenom II X4 965 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 Memory: 12 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
